Actors: John Hawkes, Helen Hunt, William H. Macy, Moon Bloodgood
Writer: Ben Lewin (written for the screen by), Mark O'Brien (article)
Title: The Sessions
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 18 wins & 63 nominations.
Plot: A man in an iron lung who wishes to lose his virginity contacts a professional sex surrogate with the help of his therapist and priest.
